info.title: Excel Online (Business)
info.description: Excel Online (Business) connector lets you work with Excel files in document libraries supported by Microsoft Graph (OneDrive for Business, SharePoint Sites, and Office 365 Groups).

get.description: Get datasets metadata.
Get datasets metadata.
Retrieves metadata for an Excel Online table.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Table name.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for an Excel Online table.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Table name.

post.description: Runs an Office Script against an Excel workbook.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Select an Excel file through File Browse.

open.selectableFilter: (MediaType eq 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or MediaType eq 'application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.macroEnabled.12' or MediaType eq 'application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.binary.macroEnabled.12')

browse.selectableFilter: (MediaType eq 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or MediaType eq 'application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.macroEnabled.12' or MediaType eq 'application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.binary.macroEnabled.12')

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Select the Office Script you want to run from the drop-down.

parameters.name: ScriptParameters
parameters.description: Provide the Office Script's parameters.

get.description: Gets all my scripts.
Gets one of my scripts.

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Script chosen to use.

post.description: Create a new table in the Excel workbook.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
Select from the drop-down or specify one of the following:
            - "me"
            - "SharePoint Site URL"
            - "users/someone's UPN"
            - "groups/group Id"
            - "sites/SharePoint Site URL:/teams/team name:" (the colons are required).

parameters.name: drive
parameters.description: Select a document library from the drop-down.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Select an Excel file through File Browse.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Excel table.

post.summary: Add a key column to a table
post.description: Add a key column to an Excel table. The new column will be appended to the right.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: drive
parameters.description: Select a document library from the drop-down.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Select an Excel file through File Browse.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Select a table from the drop-down.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

parameters.name: idColumn
parameters.description: Select a column from the drop-down.

parameters.name: dateTimeFormat
parameters.description: DateTime Format.

patch.description: Update a row using a key column. The input value will overwrite the specified cells and columns left blank will not be updated. In order to append (instead of overwrite) a value, use the "Get a row" action to retrieve the content first.

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

Range.description: Enter the table address using A1 notation.

ColumnsNames.description: Enter the columns names separated by ';' or ','.

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

ScriptParameters.description: Information about a single script's parameter schema.

ScriptReturnValues.description: Information about a single script's return schema.

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

source.name: source
source.description:
Select from the drop-down or specify one of the following:
              - "me"
              - "SharePoint Site URL"
              - "users/someone's UPN"
              - "groups/group Id"
              - "sites/SharePoint Site URL:/teams/team name:" (colons are required).

drive.description: Select a document library from the drop-down.

file.description: Select an Excel file through File Browse.
